thread.title: Catherine to play a hard-nosed MLA in Bunny’s next
thread.title_full: Catherine to play a hard-nosed MLA in Bunny’s next - The Times of India

author: Pranita Jonnalagedda
title: Catherine to play a hard-nosed MLA in Bunny’s next
text:
We were the first to break the news of Catherine Tresa's casting opposite Allu Arjun in the upcoming action entertainer directed by Boyapati Srinu. It has emerged that Catherine isn't going to be playing just an eye-candy like she did in Iddarammayilatho, her previous outing with the stylish star.
Catherine will be playing a politician informs a source in the film's unit saying, "Her role will be the surprise package in the movie. It's a very interesting role that will have her playing a hard-nosed MLA. It's a very important part of the film and director Boyapati felt that she would be perfect for the role."
Now that's going to be something to look forward to —- Catherine, the MLA. Touted to be a mass entertainer, the film features Rakul Preet Singh as the female lead.
